committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to prohibit the Secretary of Agriculture from transfering certain National Forest System lands in South Dakota.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of Agriculture from transferring specified lands in the Black Hills National Forest, South Dakota.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the Secretary of Agriculture from transfering certain National Forest System lands in South Dakota.
